message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product for $14000. I believe it's a great value, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I've done some research and I believe it's a bit pricey for my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. I understand your budget concerns, but unfortunately, $11000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $12500. This price still allows me to make a decent profit while being fair to you. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to come down in price, but $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $12000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
